variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Deidentified Subject/eMERGE ID
variable.comment: Non-enumerated value domain. Deidentified ID where the first two digits denote the origination site of the samples; site key: Marshfield Clinic=16; Vanderbilt University=27; Group Health Cooperative=38; Mayo Clinic=49; Northwestern University=52 External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2181644 (Public ID). NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: SEX
variable.description: Gender of participant
variable.comment: NA=Not Assessed; Missing=.; F=Female; M=Male; U=Unknown External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2200604 (Public ID). NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: DECADE_BIRTH
variable.description: Decade of birth
variable.comment: Group patients born prior to 1920 (>=89 years of age) into one group. 1=1900-1919; 2=1920-1929, 3=1930-1939; 4=1940-1949; 5=1950-1959; 6=Unknown. External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 3018429 (Public ID). NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: ETHNICITY
variable.description: Ethnicity of participant
variable.comment: NA=Not Assessed; Missing=.; 1=Hispanic or Latino; 0=Not Hispanic or Latino; 99=Unknown External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2002440 (Public ID). NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: RACE
variable.description: Race of participant
variable.comment: Original values: NA=Not Assessed; Missing=.; 0=Black or African American; 1=American Indian or Alaska Native; 2=Asian; 3=White; 4=Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander; 5=Other; 6=Unknown External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 106 (Public ID). NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.
variable.value: Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander

variable.name: SMOKING_STATUS
variable.description: Smoking status at enrollment
variable.comment: Original values: 1=Never Smoker; 2=Current Smoker; 3=Past Smoker; 4=Ever Smoker; 5=Unknown, if ever smoked External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2183382 (Public ID). NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: AGE_FIRST_HYPOTHYROIDISM
variable.description: Age at first hypothyroidism indication?
variable.comment: Group patients >=89 years of age into one decile .=Missing value. External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 3008901 (Public ID). NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: DIABETES_MELLITUS
variable.description: Diabetes status
variable.comment: Blank=Missing (character) External variable resource - NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010) and may have been revised by NCI since. The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: DIABETES_MELLITUS_AGE
variable.description: Age at the earliest indication of diabetes
variable.comment: Indication could be from a diagnosis code, medications, or lab values. .=Missing value. External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2442246 (Public ID). NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: DIABETIC_RETINOPATHY
variable.description: Indication of diabetic retinopathy present in the patient
variable.comment: ICD9 code of most progressed form of diabetic retinopathy recorded in the medical record.

variable.name: AGE_DIABETIC_RETINOPATHY
variable.description: Age at diagnosis of the farthest progression of diabetic retinopathy
variable.comment: Age 90+ listed as age 90. Should be the age at the time of the code entered in the Diabetic_Retinopathy field.

variable.name: EXUDATIVE_RETINOPATHY
variable.description: Indication of exudative retinopathy present in the patient
variable.comment: ICD9 code of most progressed form of exudative retinopathy recorded in the medical record.

variable.name: AGE_EXUDATIVE_RETINOPATHY
variable.description: The age of the subject at the time of the worst detected exudative retinopathy.
variable.comment: Age 90+ listed as age 90. Should be the age at the time of the code entered in the Exudative_Retinopathy field.

variable.name: MACULAR_EDEMA
variable.description: Indication of macular edema present in the patient
variable.comment: ICD9 code of most progressed form of diabetic macular edema recorded in the medical record.

variable.name: AGE_MACULAR_EDEMA
variable.description: Age at diagnosis of diabetic macular edema
variable.comment: Age 90+ listed as age 90. Should be the age at the time of the code entered in the Diabetic_Retinopathy field.

variable.name: RETINAL_ISCHEMIA
variable.description: Indication of retinal ischemia present in the patient.
variable.comment: ICD9 code of most progressed form of retinal ischemia recorded in the medical record.

variable.name: AGE_RETINAL_ISCHEMIA
variable.description: The age of the patient at the diagnosis of retinal ischemia.
variable.comment: Age 90+ listed as age 90. Should be the age at the time of the code entered in the Retinal_Ischemia field.

variable.name: AGE_LAST_EYE_EXAM
variable.description: Age at most recent CPT recorded eye exam
variable.comment: Age 90+ listed as age 90 .=Missing value. External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 3014428 (Public ID). NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.comment: External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 3008915 (Public ID). NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: BMI_MAX_BEFORE_LIPID_STUDY_EXCLUSIONS
variable.description: Subject's body mass index maximum value, calculated using measures collected before the age at which the first lipid study exclusion occurred
variable.comment: 1.Non-pregnant BMI (do not include BMIs during pregnancy or 9 months after pregnancy); 2.Imputed BMI based - 6 month time period
